General.Name: Ananti Inc
General.Description: Ananti Inc. provides leisure facilities in South Korea. The company develops, operates, maintains, and manages golf courses. It also develops hotels; operates resorts; and produces and sells liquor products. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Jincheon, South Korea.

2.Name: Mr. Hong-Gyu  Lee
2.Title: Sr. MD of Management & Accounting and Director
